summary: After two years as a Czarist British agent posing as a Russian Commissar, he rescues a Russian countess from her Bolshevik captors.
cast: Marlene Dietrich|Robert Donat|Irene Vanbrugh|Herbert Lomas|Austin Trevor|Basil Gill|David Tree|John Clements|Frederick Culley|Lawrence Hanray|Dorice Fordred|Franklyn Kelsey|Laurence Baskcomb|Hay Petrie|Miles Malleson|Allan Jeayes|Lyn Harding|Raymond Huntley|Evelyn Ankers|Derek Aylward|Noel Brophy|Peter Bull|James Carew|Peter Cozens|Mark Daly|Stephen Haggard|Lisa Lee|Edward Lexy|Gordon McLeod|Peter O'Brien|Noel Purcell|Guy Rolfe|Miklós Rózsa|Harry Terry|Torin Thatcher|Peter Evan Thomas
title: La condesa Alexandra
